About ph-schematron-parent-pom

Base POM to build the ph-schematron projects

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
ph-schematron-testfiles Schematron test files
ph-schematron Library for validating XML documents with Schematron
ph-schematron-validator Base POM to build the ph-schematron projects
ph-sch2xslt-maven-plugin Maven plugin to convert Schematron files to XSLT files at build time
ph-schemnatron-maven-plugin Maven plugin to apply Schematron rules to XML files on build time
ph-schematron-ant-task Base POM to build the ph-schematron projects
